verbs.description: [ARG0: Stormy Daniels ' attorney Michael Avenatti] [V: fired] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: at Donald Trump 's attorney Rudy Giuliani] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: after the former New York mayor referred to him as a " pimp] . "
Stormy Daniels ' attorney Michael Avenatti fired back at Donald Trump 's attorney Rudy Giuliani on Friday after [ARG0: the former New York mayor] [V: referred] [ARG1: to him] [ARG2: as a " pimp] . "
